channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken glass, 16th May
item.description:
Broken green glass on the pavement - hazardous for animals. Please could this be cleaned up? Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Pilley Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Start of cycle path impassable, 16th May
item.description:
Trees/bushes have grown over the path making it dangerous for cyclists and pedestrians due to lack of space/poor visibility

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 The Lea, Cheltenham

item.title: Street lights flashing throughout the night, 16th May
item.description:
This lamp has been continuously flashing throughout the night causing unrest and nuisance to neighbours just behind

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4063, Cheltenham

item.title: Loads of graffiti/tagging on walls, 16th May
item.description:
Loads of graffiti on walls... This has been a problem for months. A real grot spot in a grotty place I was once proud of. Please clean this town up! Equally as important, catch the offenders!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Douglas House Vittoria Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Japanese Knotweed, 15th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Marsh Gardens, Cheltenham

item.title: Badly patched pothole, 15th May
item.description:
Previously reported and has been patched several times. Patches donâ€™t last long, and loose tarmac and debris causes damage to surrounding vehicles.
